resources.string: Write Things you want to avoid

Panda AI Assistant uses accessibility services to provide voice-controlled device automation. This allows hands-free operation of your phone through AI-powered commands, making technology more accessible. The service reads screen content and performs actions only when actively requested by you.
‚≠ê The entire code is on Github

resources.string: Allow Panda to send you notifications for important updates or messages.
This lets you activate Panda by holding the home button or using a voice command, even when the app is closed.
Uses UI structure data (faster, less resource intensive)
Uses actual screenshots (more accurate, higher resource usage)
Start a new conversation with Panda
Microphone permission required for voice input

"ü§ñ Why Panda Needs Accessibility Services:
" "Panda is an AI assistant that helps you control your phone through voice commands. To do this, it requires accessibility permissions to understand and interact with your device.

" "üì± What This Permission Allows:
" "‚Ä¢ Read Screen Content: Panda can see and analyze what's currently displayed on your screen to understand the context and provide relevant assistance.

" "‚Ä¢ Perform Actions: Execute touch gestures, taps, swipes, and navigation (Back, Home, Recent Apps) on your behalf based on your voice commands.

" "‚Ä¢ App Interaction: Open apps, fill forms, scroll through content, and navigate between different screens as requested.

" "üîí Privacy & Data Protection:
" "‚Ä¢ All processing happens on Gemini API
" "‚Ä¢ No personal data is collected or but it is sent to Google Gemini
" "‚Ä¢ Screen content is only accessed when you actively use Panda, otherwise Panda doesnt access screen content
" "‚Ä¢ We implement safeguards to protect sensitive information, but Panda can still make mistake

" "‚ôø Accessibility Benefits:
" "This service enables hands-free device control, making smartphones more accessible for users with disabilities, visual impairments, or mobility limitations.

" "By proceeding, you understand and consent to Panda using accessibility services for AI-powered device automation."

Allows Panda to see the apps you have installed. With this, Panda can open applications for you directly and instantly (e.g., "Open YouTube"), instead of relying on slower methods of searching the screen. This makes the process much faster and more reliable.
If there is too much demand, our wake word service might be down, in that case we will add button at the bottom left and you can use it to activate panda
Select your preferred default voice for text-to-speech
Natural-sounding male voice with neural technology
Natural-sounding female voice with neural technology
ü§ñ Enable Panda AI to control your phone through voice commands. This permission allows reading screen content and performing actions for hands-free device automation and improved accessibility.
The microphone is required for the voice command and wake-word features. It allows you to give instructions to Panda by speaking.
This permission is used to show visual feedback, such as the questions that panda have, captions and the voice wave animations, on top of other apps while Panda is working.

At the end of a conversation, Panda\'s AI (powered by Google\'s Gemini model) analyzes the dialogue to identify lasting facts. It\'s trained to ignore fleeting or unimportant details. For example, if you say, || remind me to call my brother Ankit tomorrow ||,the AI might create a memory like: || The user\'s brother is named Anita. ||

Once a memory is created (e.g., The user lives in Ghaziabad.), it is stored in a secure, private database directly on your phone. This database is part of the Panda app\'s internal storage and is not accessible by other apps.

ü§ñ Panda is an AI assistant that needs accessibility services to control your phone through voice commands.

This permission allows Panda to:

‚Ä¢ Read screen content to understand context
‚Ä¢ Perform touches, swipes, and navigation
‚Ä¢ Automate tasks across all apps

üîí Your privacy is Google Privacy Rule for Gemini API - Your app calls Gemini API to understand his next action.

Panda requires accessibility services to function as your AI assistant.

This enables voice-controlled automation of your device for hands-free operation and improved accessibility.

üîí All data processing occurs locally on your device for maximum privacy.
Panda not working on your phone?

If Panda is not working properly, this might be due to intense battery optimization by your device manufacturer.

Manufacturers like Samsung, Huawei, OnePlus, Xiaomi, and others often add aggressive battery optimizations that can break Panda's functionality.

To fix this, you need to disable battery optimizations specifically for Panda in your device settings.
Get your free Picovoice API Key, you can paste it here.
Hey, accessibility permission is needed to execute any task. I know you might have doubt giving this permission to me, but my code is open source, so can always check it out if you have doubts.
